body: Hey y'all I'm possibly back for a little bit may not be on everyday but I hope y'all will be able to see and talk with me
body_tagged: Hey y'all I'm possibly back for a little bit may not be on everyday but I hope y'all will be able to see and talk with me
title: It's the one, the only  hunting_chick

replies.body: Welcome back! Nice Echoes on teamspeak

replies.body: Hunting! I don't know if you remember me, but hey ^-^ I remember seeing you on a long  time ago! Seen you a few times in game since then. You basically inspired me to become part of the community and become staff ;P
replies.body_tagged: Hunting! I don't know if you remember me, but hey ^-^ I remember seeing you on a long  time ago! Seen you a few times in game since then. You basically inspired me to become part of the community and become staff ;P

replies.body: I don't know how to express my joy at seeing you return to Avicus after an approximately 2-year hiatus. So glad to see you finally back! I've been waiting so long for this day! I hope I can get around to playing on Avicus with you sometime next week (i.e.: Monday). =D
replies.body_tagged: I don't know how to express my joy at seeing you return to Avicus after an approximately 2-year hiatus. So glad to see you finally back! I've been waiting so long for this day! I hope I can get around to playing on Avicus with you sometime next week (i.e.: Monday). =D

replies.body: welcome back, i remember you from some really crazy ts chats

replies.body: Kirby: I get off work my time at 12:00pm on Mondays! so yeah I will be seeing you! hey robo and thanks everyone for all the awesome comments I'm hoping to be on here more often and MAYBE considering being back on staff idk yet. well if they let my crazy ass back as staff! but I'd love to play with everyone!
